Object.Field: create table <?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFDT_MAPPING", "W") ?> ( ID VARCHAR2(150) NULL, NAME VARCHAR2(150) NULL, ORIGINAL_NAME VARCHAR2(150) NULL, MODULE VARCHAR2(100) NULL, MAX_NUMBER_OF_ERRORS NUMBER(20) NULL, ANALIZE_TARGET VARCHAR2(100) NULL, DEFAULT_OPERATING_MODE VARCHAR2(100) NULL ,IND_UPDATE char(1) ) NOLOGGING

insert /*+ APPEND */ into <?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFDT_MAPPING", "W") ?> ( ID, NAME, ORIGINAL_NAME, MODULE, MAX_NUMBER_OF_ERRORS, ANALIZE_TARGET, DEFAULT_OPERATING_MODE ,IND_UPDATE )
select
DT_MAPPING.ID, DT_MAPPING.NAME, DT_MAPPING.ORIGINAL_NAME, DT_MAPPING.MODULE, DT_MAPPING.MAX_NUMBER_OF_ERRORS, DT_MAPPING.ANALIZE_TARGET, DT_MAPPING.DEFAULT_OPERATING_MODE,
'I' IND_UPDATE
from <?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "DT_MAPPING", "DT_TCL", "", "D")?> DT_MAPPING where (1=1)
minus select ID, NAME, ORIGINAL_NAME, MODULE, MAX_NUMBER_OF_ERRORS, ANALIZE_TARGET, DEFAULT_OPERATING_MODE ,'I' IND_UPDATE from <?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "DT_MAPPING", "DT_TCL", "", "D") ?>

create table <?=snpRef.getObjectNameDefaultPSchema("L", "SNP_CHECK_TAB", "W") ?> ( CATALOG_NAME <?=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100") ?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?> , SCHEMA_NAME <?=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100") ?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?> , RESOURCE_NAME <?=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100") ?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>, FULL_RES_NAME <?=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100") ?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>, ERR_TYPE <?=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "1") ?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>, ERR_MESS <?=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "250") ?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?> , CHECK_DATE <?=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_DATE") ?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>, ORIGIN <?=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100") ?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>, CONS_NAME <?=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "128") ?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>, CONS_TYPE <?=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "2") ?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>, ERR_COUNT <?=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_NUMERIC", "10") ?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?> )

delete from <?=snpRef.getObjectNameDefaultPSchema("L", "SNP_CHECK_TAB", "W") ?> where SCHEMA_NAME = '<?=snpRef.getSchemaName("DT_TCL", "D") ?>' and ORIGIN = '(1001)PRJ_VCR4ODI.INT_EXAMPLENOTT PERMITTED !' and ERR_TYPE = 'F'

create table <?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "%ERR_PRFDT_MAPPING", "W") ?> ( ODI_ROW_ID UROWID, ODI_ERR_TYPE <?=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "1") ?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>, ODI_ERR_MESS <?=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "250") ?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>, ODI_CHECK_DATE <?=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_DATE") ?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>, ID VARCHAR2(150) <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>, NAME VARCHAR2(150) <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>, ORIGINAL_NAME VARCHAR2(150) <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>, MODULE VARCHAR2(100) <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>, MAX_NUMBER_OF_ERRORS NUMBER(20) <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>, ANALIZE_TARGET VARCHAR2(100) <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>, DEFAULT_OPERATING_MODE VARCHAR2(100) <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>, ODI_ORIGIN <?=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100") ?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>, ODI_CONS_NAME <?=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "128") ?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>, ODI_CONS_TYPE <?=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "2") ?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>, ODI_PK <?=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "32") ?> PRIMARY KEY, ODI_SESS_NO <?=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "19") ?> )

delete from <?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "%ERR_PRFDT_MAPPING", "W") ?> where (ODI_ERR_TYPE = 'S' and 'F' = 'S') or (ODI_ERR_TYPE = 'F' and ODI_ORIGIN = '(1001)PRJ_VCR4ODI.INT_EXAMPLENOTT PERMITTED !')

insert into <?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "%ERR_PRFDT_MAPPING", "W") ?> ( ODI_PK, ODI_SESS_NO, ODI_ROW_ID, ODI_ERR_TYPE, ODI_ERR_MESS, ODI_ORIGIN, ODI_CHECK_DATE, ODI_CONS_NAME, ODI_CONS_TYPE, ID, NAME, ORIGINAL_NAME, MODULE, MAX_NUMBER_OF_ERRORS, ANALIZE_TARGET, DEFAULT_OPERATING_MODE ) select SYS_GUID(), <?=snpRef.getSession("SESS_NO") ?>, rowid, 'F', 'ODI-15064: The primary key SYS_C0021208 is not unique.', '(1001)PRJ_VCR4ODI.INT_EXAMPLENOTT PERMITTED !', sysdate, 'SYS_C0021208', 'PK', DT_MAPPING.ID, DT_MAPPING.NAME, DT_MAPPING.ORIGINAL_NAME, DT_MAPPING.MODULE, DT_MAPPING.MAX_NUMBER_OF_ERRORS, DT_MAPPING.ANALIZE_TARGET, DT_MAPPING.DEFAULT_OPERATING_MODE from <?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFDT_MAPPING", "W") ?> DT_MAPPING where exists ( select SUB.ID from <?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFDT_MAPPING", "W") ?> SUB where SUB.ID=DT_MAPPING.ID group by SUB.ID having count(1) > 1 )

insert into <?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "%ERR_PRFDT_MAPPING", "W") ?> ( ODI_PK, ODI_SESS_NO, ODI_ROW_ID, ODI_ERR_TYPE, ODI_ERR_MESS, ODI_CHECK_DATE, ODI_ORIGIN, ODI_CONS_NAME, ODI_CONS_TYPE, ID, NAME, ORIGINAL_NAME, MODULE, MAX_NUMBER_OF_ERRORS, ANALIZE_TARGET, DEFAULT_OPERATING_MODE ) select SYS_GUID(), <?=snpRef.getSession("SESS_NO") ?>, rowid, 'F', 'ODI-15066: The column ID cannot be null.', sysdate, '(1001)PRJ_VCR4ODI.INT_EXAMPLENOTT PERMITTED !', 'ID', 'NN', ID, NAME, ORIGINAL_NAME, MODULE, MAX_NUMBER_OF_ERRORS, ANALIZE_TARGET, DEFAULT_OPERATING_MODE from <?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFDT_MAPPING", "W") ?> where ID is null

delete from <?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFDT_MAPPING", "W") ?> T where exists ( select 1 from <?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "%ERR_PRFDT_MAPPING", "W") ?> E where ODI_SESS_NO = <?=snpRef.getSession("SESS_NO") ?> and T.rowid = E.ODI_ROW_ID )

insert into <?=snpRef.getObjectNameDefaultPSchema("L", "SNP_CHECK_TAB", "W") ?> ( SCHEMA_NAME, RESOURCE_NAME, FULL_RES_NAME, ERR_TYPE, ERR_MESS, CHECK_DATE, ORIGIN, CONS_NAME, CONS_TYPE, ERR_COUNT ) select '<?=snpRef.getSchemaName("DT_TCL", "D") ?>', 'DT_MAPPING', '<?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "DT_MAPPING", "DT_TCL", "", "D") ?>', E.ODI_ERR_TYPE, E.ODI_ERR_MESS, E.ODI_CHECK_DATE, E.ODI_ORIGIN, E.ODI_CONS_NAME, E.ODI_CONS_TYPE, count(1) from <?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "%ERR_PRFDT_MAPPING", "W") ?> E where E.ODI_ERR_TYPE = 'F' and E.ODI_ORIGIN = '(1001)PRJ_VCR4ODI.INT_EXAMPLENOTT PERMITTED !' group by E.ODI_ERR_TYPE, E.ODI_ERR_MESS, E.ODI_CHECK_DATE, E.ODI_ORIGIN, E.ODI_CONS_NAME, E.ODI_CONS_TYPE
insert check sum into check table
